sahena durak owun luhubanda giya pasu, kalaya manda wu bawin, owhu aapasu paminiyo ya. 26 eya sabath dinata pera dina sandhyawa wu heyin owhu sathura luhubanda yama dirgha nokalaha. 27 owhu sathurage awiaayudha ekathu kota, owun kollakagath dewal uduragena, samindanan wahansege karunawe pini poda thaman matha pathitha wimata salasu edina wana sabath dawase di un wahanse wetha hada pathlen pana nangina prashansawa saha sthuthiya puda kalaha. 28 sabath dawasa awasan wu pasu owhu pidanaya nisa karadarayata path wu aya athara da wandambauwan saha anathayan athara da, thaman kollakagath dewalin kotasak beda dunha.
